text: from up here above the border village of
carriage app you can see just how close
Turkey is to the front line this is the
barbed-wire border fence between Turkey
and Syria
just beyond it lies a minefield and then
up on that hill in the distance there is
the focus of pretty intense fighting
between the rival sides Islamic state
fighters who control a village in that
direction we've seen vehicles moving
steadily from there across the land up
the hill to the crest towards the
position of the Kurdish militia the YPG
and all the while pretty regular
exchange of mortars rifle and machine
gunfire we've seen plumes of smoke from
above there and the regular crack of
rifle and machine gunfire you can still
hear it in the distance
all the while Kurds have gathered here
on this hill watching the battle unfold
and taking up position in the Turkish
military Watchtower cheering on the YPG
as they try to repel the Islamic state
fighters as the battle for kobani rages
on
